name: unreal-orm
description: UnrealORM is a modern, type-safe ORM for SurrealDB that gives you native SurrealDB power, full TypeScript safety, and zero abstractionâ€”no decorators, no magic, just classes and functions. Designed for developers who want direct control, advanced schema features, and a frictionless experience.
